operation.search: return new AlphaChannelBar(texture, value, maxValue, barListener);
operation.add: return new AlphaChannelBar(com.kotcrab.vis.ui.VisUI.getSkin().get(com.kotcrab.vis.ui.widget.color.ColorPickerStyle.class), texture, value, maxValue, barListener);

operation.search: return new ChannelBar(texture, value, maxValue, barListener);
operation.add: return new ChannelBar(com.kotcrab.vis.ui.VisUI.getSkin().get(com.kotcrab.vis.ui.widget.color.ColorPickerStyle.class), texture, value, maxValue, barListener);
